topic.title: Ability to change the port the web server runs on and the IP address it runs on
topic.body: Ability to change the port the web server runs on and the IP address it runs on

topic.title: Blank whitespace forum posts should not be allowed
topic.body: If you wanted you could make a post on the forum module with a title consiting of a space and a body content consisting of a space. This should not be allowed.

topic.title: Grammar error on ZeroHello module page
topic.body:
The sentence in the pruple banner `This site currently served by 70 peers without any central server.` is grammatically incorrect and should be `This site is currently served by 70 peers without any central server.` **is** was needed.

Also I think this (for some reason) appelas to me to phrase it like this: `This site is currently being served by 70 peers without any central server.`

topic.title: Found a bug in the forum module
topic.body:
1. Make a comment or post somewhere that has a value (text) that is very long.
2. Post the comment or new topic
3. You will get an invalid private key error (but it will still post)

As long as that long-valued post or comment exists, you will continuously get an `Invalid private key` error until you delete that long-valued post.

If you made a long-valued post, you can still post (with an error) but not comment.
If you made a long-valued comment, you can still comment and post.

topic.title: Another bug in forum module
topic.body:
1. Create a forum topic
2. Click on the topic to view it
3. Delete the topic whilst you are viewing the full topic
4. It will still exist on the system.

For example: http://talk.zeronetwork.bit/?Topic:21_1JdoX9KdJeRVjN9zvK8N9C5jybEHzZe8n/f

topic.title: Memory imporvements
topic.body: Import only what you need, not all the other data.

topic.title: Error in docs
topic.body:
On this page here: http://zeronet.readthedocs.org/en/latest/help_zeronet/network_protocol/

The description for the `ping` function says `Pong` rather than `Ping`. `i` is very near to the `o` on the keyboard, so this is a typo.

topic.title: Shutdown via GUI
topic.body: I think I nice feature would be to have on the home-screen `ZeroHello` two buttons at the top of the screen that can 1. restart the client and 2. shutdown the client.

topic.title: HTML File Indexing
topic.body: It would be nice to have a new module that can be used for hosting files or just a new feature to ZeroNet that indexes sites with no `index.html` file.

topic.title: Need help on checking my summary of ZeroNet
topic.body:
I am writing a page on ZeroNet for LibreNet SA's wiki and would like to know if the information I have written on ZeroNet is correct in terms of the system.

https://wiki.librenet.co.za/doku.php?id=librenetsa:networking:decentralized:zeronet

You can easily sign up for an account on the wiki and make your changes as you see fit.

Also I need the description to be relatively in laymans terms.

topic.title: Unpinning and stuff.
topic.body:
Say now there are three files like so:

`File 1`

`File 2`

`File 3`

And `File 1` and `File 3` are pinned.

Then select them all in the following order, `File 1`, `File 2` and `File 3` (because `File 3` is last and is pinned then the button will say "Unpin"). When you click "Unpin" it says, 3 files unpinned which is incorrect as only two were unpinned.

Also, try doing the opposite, it isn't quite the same but still has the wrong number of pinned files.
